CustomField.description: Provide a narrative that 1) defines the integrated design process, and 2) describes a plan to determine and reach HPGB performance goals, engage project stakeholders, identify feedback mechanism to meet HPGB goals, and resolution processes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please provide a narrative that 1) defines the integrated design process, and 2) describes a plan to determine and reach HPGB performance goals, engage project stakeholders, and identify a feedback mechanism for best practices and lessons learned.
CustomField.label: Integrated Design Narrative
